# gamefabric_service_account_password (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `service_account` (String) The name of the service account.

### Optional

- `labels` (Map of String) A map of labels to assign to the service account password.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `password_wo` (String, Sensitive) The password for the service account (write-only, only available on creation and updates).
